channel.title: HELP PLEASE READ! Potions, and Commands

item.title: HELP PLEASE READ! Potions, and Commands
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

hey! ok im trying to make a command that when i type “pp” is sets my mage to 500 kinda like a super pot. any help will be awesome.
here is what i got but i cant have “c.” in it

if (command.startsWith("pp")) {
playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + 500;
sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[6] + "", 4014);
}

i dont want it to add to the lv i just want to set it to 500.

THANKS!

Read full topic
item.source: HELP PLEASE READ! Potions, and Commands
